abstract: On this week's podcast, Ms. Orlean discusses "Rin Tin Tin."
snippet: On this week's podcast, Ms. Orlean discusses "Rin Tin Tin."
lead_paragraph: In Sunday's Book Review, Jennifer Schuessler reviews "Rin Tin Tin: The Life and the Legend" by The New Yorker writer Susan Orlean. The book chronicles the life of the famous German shepherd who was born on a World War I battlefield, conquered Hollywood and emerged victorious as the perfect family-friendly icon of cold war gunslinging.

headline.main: Book Review Podcast: Susan Orlean's 'Rin Tin Tin'
